domains.Financial Management: Skills related to financial planning, analysis, reporting, and compliance.
domains.Electrical Engineering: Skills related to electrical systems, circuit design, and electronic components.
domains.Programming and Embedded Systems: Skills related to programming, particularly for embedded systems.
domains.Data Analysis and Interpretation: Skills related to analyzing and interpreting data.
domains.Environmental Management: Skills related to environmental compliance, resource management, and sustainability.
domains.Manufacturing and Production: Skills related to manufacturing processes, quality control, and production optimization.
domains.Food Safety and Standards: Skills related to food safety, sanitation, and regulatory compliance.
domains.Procurement and Supply Chain: Skills related to procurement, supply chain management, and logistics.
domains.Hotel and Hospitality Management: Skills related to hotel operations, guest services, and hospitality management.
domains.Insurance and Risk Management: Skills related to risk assessment, insurance claims, and regulatory compliance.
domains.Legal and Compliance: Skills related to legal practices, compliance, and regulatory standards.
domains.Maritime Operations: Skills related to maritime cargo handling, vessel communication, and port operations.
domains.Customer Service and Relations: Skills related to customer service, client relations, and communication.
domains.Technical Drawing and Interpretation: Skills related to technical drawing, schematic interpretation, and equipment problem-solving.
domains.Equipment Maintenance and Repair: Skills related to maintaining, repairing, and troubleshooting equipment.
domains.Negotiation and Contract Management: Skills related to negotiation, contract management, and vendor partnerships.
domains.Event Planning and Management: Skills related to event planning, management, and tourism.
domains.Art and Visual Arts: Skills related to visual arts, creative expression, and art history.
domains.Automotive and Mechanical Repair: Skills related to automotive troubleshooting, equipment repair, and technical documentation.
domains.Information Management and Security: Skills related to data protection, information management, and digital archiving.
